list_definition.definition: the fourth sign of the Zodiac, represented by a crab, for people born between 22 June and 23 July
(also Cancerian) someone who was born between 22 June and 23 July
a diseased growth in the body, often fatal

list_definition.definition: the (often fatal) condition caused by such diseased growth(s)
